WorkflowInfo.Name: Send SQL query result via HTML
WorkflowInfo.Description: Execute SQL query and send the result as HTML using email
WorkflowInfo.XML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:TSQLQuery;Assembly=TSQLQuery, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:ConvertToHTMLTable;Assembly=ConvertToHTMLTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:TSQLQuery Password="11111111" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" isUserAuthenticate="True" DisplayName="TSQL Query" IsValid="True" SiteId="0" ConnectionString="Data Source=myServerAddress;Initial Catalog=myDataBase;User Id=db_user;Password=11111111;" TypeName="TSQLQuery" Query="select * from accounts" SiteName="Default Site" EyeShareConnectionString="True" TimeInSeconds="0" x:Name="tsqlQuery1" Timeout="00:01:00" UserName="db_user" Description="Run SQL query on microsoft database" ConnectionStringTextBox="Data Source=myServerAddress;Initial Catalog=myDataBase" /><ns1:ConvertToHTMLTable Value="%tsqlQuery1%" IsValid="True" x:Name="convertToHTMLTable1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Convert a ResultSet to an HTML table." DisplayName="Convert to HTML Table" TypeName="ConvertToHTMLTable" /><ns2:SendEmail Channel="Email" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="SQL Query Result" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=windows-1252" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 10.00.9200.16721"></HEAD>
<BODY><PRE><PRE>%convertToHTMLTable1%</PRE></PRE></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
